title: UNIX - AFTER ATLAS EOD*2 MIS FILES TO BE SAVED

task_list.instruction_title:
_RUN and DR : Ev3 Server : lxvgvamisev301p_

_CUTOVER : PRD Server : lxvgvamisprd01p_

_**A Control M job has been created in order to automate Unix action which was (as a reminder):**_

_tar cvf STAR2_ATLAS_MIS.dat /ESS_dataImportMIS/host/data/FDWT*/ESS_dataImportMIS/host/data/*.ok and /ESS_dataImportMIS/host/data/FSX*_

_cd  /ESS_dataImportMIS/host/data/      
rm FDWT*      
rm *.ok      
rm FSX*_
